Rion/Swyft/Tavatron

Rion:

Rion released Diana's wrist and tore across the sand and through the trees. 
He could hear Diana's footsteps just behind him, assuming those were her 
steps anyway. Rion pushed through the thick vegetation on the other side of 
the trees and stopped short.

(I'm going to let you take it from here Meg^_^)

* * * * *

Swyft:

(I didn't get a reply to my last e-mail, so I'm just gonna... do something, 
yea...)

A light scraping noise and small scratches marked Syft's passing as she 
dragged her claws against the left wall of the hallway. She was a little 
bored and had not been listening to Devilduer's response (If there was one):

"Who did you say your leader was?"

* * * * *

Tavatron:

Tavatron stretched and groaned as she pushed herself into an akward position 
against the side of the CR chamber. It had taken a while, but all of the 
internal damage had been repaired.

<No thanks to you.>

'What is that supposed to mean?'

Tavatron rubbed the side of her head as she pushed the CR hatch open all the 
way. She clambered out, her legs unsteady after being in a confined space 
for so long. She stretched one, then the other before leaning back and 
twisting, listening as her back cracked into place.

<You've nearly gotten us killed numerous times since our arrival. I don't 
plan on dying anytime soon. You, on the other hand, are expendable.>

Tavatron's body became rigid as waves of electricity shot through her. The 
voltage forced her to lean against the wall for support and dig her claws 
into the thick metal. Finally, after several antagonizing minutes Tavatron 
was able to force Tav to release her hold on the form they shared and 
collapsed against the wall.

'That... hurt.'

<Yes, and there is nothing you can do about-->

Tav cried out as Tavatron mentally shut her out from any conscious thought.

"Finally, peace."

Tavatron walked through what remained of the original CF. It seemed a lot 
had happened since she entered the 'R chamber. The battle still raged, but 
on a less impressive scale. The sounds told her what little she needed to 
know. Tavatron left the ship and watched as the Decepticons battled with the 
Maximals and vice versa.

(If I made any mistakes lemme know, kay?)
